channel.title: Shadows Under Characters & Different Weapon Emoticons
channel.description: Go to Runescape's main page. Click View Ingame Screenshots. Skim through them. Be patient you'll see it! Shadows Under Characters & Different Weapon Emoticons! Soon to come probably.

item.title: Shadows Under Characters & Different Weapon Emoticons
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

The character shadows came about a month or so ago, I believe. It came along with the NPC shadows in some more recent graphic updates.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

Niall:

Haven’t the shadows been in the game(high detail) since the fally graphics update?

I dont think so… Lemme check high detail, I go on low detail cause both look shit.

EDIT: Yes, under Monsters maybe, but not under Characters.

item.title: Shadows Under Characters & Different Weapon Emoticons
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Oh? They show to me.

[quote author=exe626 link=topic=241621.msg2045232#msg2045232 date=1202689156]
Wow, I haven’t looked through the screenshots since the early days when they where first placed back in '02. I love what they’ve done to Taverly:
http://www.runescape.com/img/screenshots/shots/members_herblore1c.jpg
Makes me wish I could go and check the place out.

There’s a few things that caught my attention(I don’t play anymore, so I’m not up-to-date with what’s new). What’s this:
http://www.runescape.com/img/screenshots/shots/members_barrelchest.jpg
This:
http://www.runescape.com/img/screenshots/shots/members_god_wars.jpg
And this:
http://www.runescape.com/img/screenshots/shots/members_catherby_farming1b.jpg[/Quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Shadows Under Characters & Different Weapon Emoticons
